ygData.subject: RE: Guise of the Deceiver
ygData.msgSnippet: They actually fixed the no equip = no usage problem?  That might be the single biggest Enhancement Verant has made to date.  Is it still No Drop I wonder?
ygData.messageBody:
They actually fixed the no equip = no usage problem? That might be the
single biggest Enhancement Verant has made to date. Is it still No Drop I
wonder?

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 5:49 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Guise of the Deceiver


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Katy Westerman wrote:
>
> Just saw that this had been changed in the patch. Anyone have any
> info?

Apparently the Assassin no longer drops the guise, but an
equivalent item which must be equipped to be used (BRD/ROG
only).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...

with the subject submissions.
